column5: There ya go, irrefutable truth the Lock Ness Monster lives  http://www.torontosun.com/lochness
Well Joey, if it's in the Toronto Sun, it must be true

Wellll Ch'ya  Ontario also has a resident lake Monster---books written and even news teams from LA sent at the time to investigate   Yup---it's "Mussie" of Muskrat Lake in Cobden. Ontario  10 miles long and places near 300 ft deep---once near the Voyageurs route around the rapids of the Ottawa River  Aaaaaand ya'll know da guy dat painted the postcard for ole Cobden town
There's also champ, ogopogo and a monster in lake erie

Thanks Joey  Yeah they didn't want to put "monster" on the postcard---as tourist operators didn't want to scare kids from swimming---true story
Ontario has a herd of monsters in Ottawa....some in tronta too at Queens Park...
